TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationException extends System.SystemException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConfigurationException extends System.SystemException

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Serializable]
[<System.Serializable>]

summary.span: 发生配置系统错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a configuration system error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序尝试读取数据或将数据写入配置文件，但未成功，则会引发异常。The exception is thrown if the application attempts to read or write data to the configuration file but is unsuccessful. 导致这种情况的可能原因包括：配置文件中存在格式错误的 XML、文件权限问题以及值无效的配置属性。Some possible reasons for this can include malformed XML in the configuration file, file permission issues, and configuration properties with values that are not valid. > [!NOTE] > 保留对象是为了向后兼容。The object is maintained for backward compatibility. 对象会将其替换为配置系统。The object replaces it for the configuration system.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取对引发此配置异常的原因的说明。

span.span: Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.

value.span: 对引发此 异常的原因的说明。

span.span: A description of why this exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不包含配置文件的名称，也不包含发生此异常的行号 。The property does not contain the name of the configuration file, nor the line number at which this exception occurred. 如果需要包含配置文件名称和行号的消息以及属性返回的消息 ，请使用 属性。If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message returned by the property, use the property.

summary.span: 用发生此配置异常处的文件名和行号设置 对象。

span.span: Sets the object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置一个 对象，该对象具有发生此异常的文件名和行号 。The method sets a object with the file name and line number at which this exception occurred. 在反序列化期间，将 从 通过流传输的对象重建异常。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the object that is transmitted over the stream.
